stories.text:
Every tech company allows you to delete your tech account. Hacker news will not. I posted last year concerning this issue which received a lot of concern from users.

I posted this year and received more than a dozen points before the post was flagged and removed.

If you are concerned about privacy, copyright and publishing, You should be concerned that you can’t control or delete your created content on this platform.
stories.title: Hacker News will never delete your comments or account ever
Covid antiviral pills: what scientists still want to know
Liberal Hypocrisy Is Fueling American Inequality (NYT Opinion)
System76 Open Source Contributions to Linux Community
